Articles.Content: Are there any additional rules when it comes to making blog posts/comments? For example, do the blogs have to be relevant to KSP or can they be about anything (besides spam)?

Blogs can be about anything, but make sure you do adhere to the Community Rules.

So, yeah, just don't break those and you'll be fine.
